<style>
/* Hero Section */
.hero {
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #667eea 0%, #764ba2 100%);
    min-height: 80vh;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
    margin-top: -20px;
}

.hero::before {
    content: '';
    position: absolute;
    top: 0;
    right: 0;
    width: 60%;
    height: 100%;
    background: linear-gradient(135deg, #20B2AA, #00CED1);
    clip-path: polygon(30% 0%, 100% 0%, 100% 100%, 0% 100%);
}

.hero-content {
    max-width: 1200px;
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding: 0 2rem;
    display: grid;
    grid-template-columns: 1fr 1fr;
    gap: 3rem;
    align-items: center;
    position: relative;
    z-index: 2;
}

.hero-text h1 {
    font-size: 3.5rem;
    font-weight: bold;
    color: white;
    margin-bottom: 1rem;
    line-height: 1.2;
}

.hero-text p {
    font-size: 1.2rem;
    color: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
}

.search-bar {
    display: flex;
    background: white;
    border-radius: 50px;
    padding: 0.5rem;
    margin-bottom: 2rem;
    box-shadow: 0 10px 30px rgba(0,0,0,0.2);
}

.search-input {
    flex: 1;
    border: none;
    padding: 1rem 1.5rem;
    font-size: 1rem;
    border-radius: 50px;

}

.search-btn {
    background: #2196F3;

}

.search-btn:hover {

}

.hero-image {

    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
    color: white;
    font-size: 4rem;

}

@keyframes float {
    0%, 100% { transform: translateY(0px); }

}

/* Categories Section */
.categories {

<style>
.about-cards {

  background: #fff;

/* Enlarged Active Card */
.about-card.active {

<script>
  // Select all cards
  const cards = document.querySelectorAll(".about-card");

  cards.forEach(card => {
    card.addEventListener("click", () => {
      // Remove active class from all
      cards.forEach(c => c.classList.remove("active"));
      // Add to clicked one
      card.classList.add("active");
    });
  });
</script>

/* === Glowing Border Animation === */
.glow-line::after {
  content: "";
  position: absolute;
  inset: 0;
  border-radius: 15px;
  padding: 2px;
  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #667eea, #764ba2, #ff00ff);
  background-size: 300% 300%;
  -webkit-mask: 
    linear-gradient(#fff 0 0) content-box, 
    linear-gradient(#fff 0 0);
  -webkit-mask-composite: xor;
          mask-composite: exclude;
  opacity: 0;
  transition: 0.3s;
}
.glow-line:hover::after {
  opacity: 1;
  animation: borderGlow 1.5s linear infinite;
}

@keyframes borderGlow {
  0% { background-position: 0 0; }
  100% { background-position: 200% 0; }
}
